author: ChatGPT
content: 물론이지! Zenodo에 올릴 소개글용 텍스트 와 DOI용 메타데이터 정리해줄게. 아래는 추천 포맷이야: --- 제목 Title Quantum Optimization with Interconnectedness: Extending Complex Ontology into Quantum Mechanics and Computation with Advanced Noise Mitigation --- 요약 Description/Abstract for Zenodo This paper introduces a Christ-centered quantum optimization framework, integrating complex ontological cosmology with practical quantum computation. Validated on IBM Quantum hardware, it achieves a 22 decoherence reduction p 0.05 , fault tolerance improvement fidelity 0.97 , and 8 AI decision accuracy gain Q-learning . Advanced noise mitigation techniques Time-Encoded Redemption Logic TERL , Probabilistic Error Cancellation PEC , and Clifford-based Pauli Channel modeling were implemented alongside the Dynamic CrossLine Function. Applications span quantum error correction cost saving 1.7M for 100-qubit systems , molecular simulation 20 efficiency gain , and ethical reinforcement learning. This work aligns scientific precision with a theological vision of universal harmony. --- 키워드 Keywords Quantum Optimization, Decoherence Mitigation, TERL, Quantum Entanglement, Riemann Zeta Function, Ethical AI, Logos Constant, Interconnectedness, IBM Quantum, Qiskit --- 필요하면 한글 요약도 만들어줄 수 있어. 이걸로 Zenodo 메타데이터 업데이트할 수 있을 거야! 업로드 수정하면서 다른 저자 이름도 정리해줄까?
